title: Disney's ESPN planning to cut up to 350 jobs - Bloomberg
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
Oct 20 (Reuters) - Walt Disney Co's sports network ESPN is planning to cut up to 350 jobs, Bloomberg reported, citing people with knowledge ...
